alert.note: Alert for Boyle; Casey; Garrard; Lincoln; Madison (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 06 at 1:22PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding or Flash Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of Indiana and Kentucky, including the following counties, in Indiana, Jefferson. In Kentucky, Adair, Anderson, Bourbon, Boyle, Casey, Clark, Clinton, Cumberland, Fayette, Franklin, Garrard, Harrison, Henry, Jessamine, Lincoln, Madison, Mercer, Nicholas, Russell, Scott, Trimble and Woodford. * WHEN...Through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Scattered to numerous showers and storms are expected this afternoon through tonight. Storms may produce heavy rainfall. Flash flooding could occur in locations that experience repeated storms and excessive rainfall. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood or Flash Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
